>>34031460
>Medieval Esotericism
Before there was Paracelsianism, Christian Kabbalah, Freemasonry and Rosicrucianism during the Medieval period there were 3 esoteric paths one could take, each corresponding to the 3 Classes of Medieval Christendom, those who pray, those who fight and those who work, but they aren't three separate paths but three sides of the same Christian Esotericism
Those who pray, the Monastics, focused on asceticism and practiced Lectio Divina, from them the other 2 originate from. Some of the most important Monastic writers are Saint Bonaventure and Meister Eckhart
The second is the Chivalrous path, that of the Templar Monastics and their Troubadour and Minnesinger contemporaries, they focus on Religious Eros through their love in some, examples of this tradition are the writtings of Dante as well as the Grail Cycle in the Arthurian Tradition
The third is connected to the stonemasons who created the Cathedrals of the High and Late Middle Ages, focusing on a mathematical mysticism, representatives of this tradition are Abbot Suger and the mysticism of Nicholas of Cusa

posts.name: The Ape of
posts.com:
>>34035323
Are you sure you want me to that?

Ngondro just means 'preliminary'. I presume you mean 'the standardized bureaucratic "concise, intermediate, extensive" rubrics of "one hundred thousand this mantra" and not 'prep in general'. These are an unfortunate "least bad" solution to "how the fuck do we onboard everyone from former murderers to the wealthy and educated?".

In the very old days formal ngondro does not appear to have existed at all. Then a few violence cycles at the root of the Kagyu lineage had it's stewards say "fuck this we're gonna avoid having to beat half to death from now on" and the other schools pretty much adopted the model by what like 1100ish?

Some branches of Vajrayana outside of Tibet have no standardized ngondro process whatsoever. Your guru discerns where you need work, you get work assigned, usually far less than what gets put in front of you for intermediate/extensive materials in Tibet, and you hammer it out together.

Preparatory/preliminary work is 'ngondro' and is mandatory for Vajrayana.
This being in the form of relatively standard uniform "drop and give me 100,000" scripts is almost but not entirely unique to Tibet. This gets back to the whole "Vajrayana is a totalized state religion" thing. When "every single use case you can imagine" becomes governmental policy, modestly extensive penance cycles proliferate. This is just...a fact of operating state religion, as far as I can tell. It allows me to give the same answer to everyone that comes in the door and defer the hard work of figuring out what your specific fetters are and how to shatter them until you've broken some of the easier ones on your own time.

>>34036213
If you liked Words of My Perfect Teacher right out of the gate, go Nyingthik. A teacher would probably say you have some karmic affinity for that tradition, as it is written by Patrul Rinpoche, a highly revered Nyingmapa in the Nyingthik lineage.
The big difference is that Nyingthik is highly focused on getting a student into Dzogchen practices, and then focusing on Dzogchen practices. It actually has what is basically a curriculum of practices and texts to follow designed to maximize and squeeze as much insight from Dzogchen as possible.

Dudjom Tersar also has Dzogchen stuff, but they don't tunnel vision it like Longchen does. Also, historically, Dudjom Tersar Lamas and Dudjom Lingpa himself are frequently questioned, mainly because the tradition arose due to Dudjom Lingpa supposedly directly communing with Manjusri and Chenrezig, which is a pretty massive claim that has often been met with skepticism even by Nyingma practitioners.

>>34036272
>is it purely because of the Jupiter-Mercury conjunction?
Because the Moons house ruler is in Scorpio, Scorpio is known for intentionally seeking out the hidden things. Pisces is a very intuitive sign, this is reinforced by the Moon being the sect light and by being in the term of the Suns house ruler.
When a house ruler is in its own house it can act freely, but when it is the guest on another house it must conform to the rules of that house, so while say, Jupiter can do fully Jupiter things in a Jupiter way while in Sag, if he is in Aries, for example, he must do his Jupiter things in a more Martial way (and this also depends on where Mars is and his condition).
>are the Egyptian terms more accurate?
Not inherently. They just seem to work better for me, and they were the ones used by the majority of the ancients. Use what gives YOU the best accuracy.

posts.name: The Ape of
posts.com:
>>34037267
>Can any of you describe what to you are the real distinctions and differences between Dzogchen and Mahamudra?
So this is kind of a hard topic and I think the division is a little less cut and dry than a lot of discourse makes it appear. For example, the initiation I hold is a "complete path" with includes preliminaries, sadhana of a mahamudra variety, dzogchen initiation, and some dzogchen practices. Keeping in mind that's my interface with this stuff and I've barely touched rushen, the way I think of it is like this: Dzogchen is an alternative to completion stage practices that look slightlys less like a traditional continental Indian yogic practice and slightly more like a staunchly Asian contemplative practice in the style of Chan or Zen for example in at least some threads of Dzogchen there's this idea that you're not even working on your tummo anymore because if you're doing the other shit correctly it will sort itself without strain.

Another thing is that while Dzogchen is usually thought of as the purview of Nyingma, it does have little reservoirs in other schools too. No matter what the realpolitik of Tibet actually looks like in an ideal state these aren't schools in competition with each other they compliment each other and like plug gaps that the others don't even want to touch right? Like this is why autocephaly works so well for the Orthbros in the long run - you're letting folks operate their own silos with some degree of independence instead of trying to enforce uniform doctrine across the polity.

Even myself I have Ekayana and Rime sensibilities there's value learning from ALL the Diamond schools, not just Tibet - check out Shingon and Azhaliism (if you even can) and Newar and the Dragon School over in Bhutan like fuckin' immerse yourself in Buddhism PLEASE for the love of god lol. There is a huge cultural intellectual tradition and the vast vast majority of people ignore it

Ape, you know of Gurdjieff and the Sarmoun story/mythos he put out, right?

I was made aware of a man who once served as a spiritual teacher at the Bennett Institute in England a few decades ago, before he broke away from it, regarding Western groups affiliated with Gurdjieff as “defunct,” G. having failed to establish a proper lineage and his teachings subtly flawed even if coming from very high sources and having some very useful and valid elements.

Not even the meaty part yet, sorry — anyway, he organized a pilgrimage of himself and other students of the Bennett Institute to India and nearby regions to get in touch with the sources of Gurdjieff’s teachings. He claims to have himself been in a “Sarmoun”/“Sarmoung”/“Sarmaun”/“Sarmawn powerhouse” (various phonetic transliterations)zThe Sarmoun brotherhood was, for him, the higher authority not just of (certain sects of and more esoteric) Sufism but also of "...a line of Hindu Rishis, and the Tibetan Kargyupta (Kagyu, Kargyudpa) Sect, which are all one in a certain location in the Trans-Himalayas, or near there."

If I put together what this guy claims to have found, Gurdjieff’s writings on this and own claims, as well as other closely affiliated literature (like Naqshbandi-Sufi-affiliated/Idries-Shah-school literature like “The Teachers of Gurdjieff” by Rafael Lefort, “The People of the Secret” by Ernest Scott, and “Among the Dervishes” by Omar Michael Burke, similar accounts of people finding the teachers or sources of Gurdjieff, heavily skewed towards Sufis), one gets an interesting picture.

>>34039348
It seems like a more realistic group acting and thinking like how the Theosophists imagined their fanciful Mahatmas to be like. Possibly being, the most advanced, learned, developed and wise of these various traditions (Tibetan Buddhism, other forms of Buddhism, Central Asian shamanism, Islamic Sufism, Hindu yoga, tantric practitioners at large) meeting in Central Asia, pooling their wisdom together and even establishing their own syncretic/universalist monasteries and communes.

Some of them could have been the impetus behind Blavatsky’s founding of Theosophy, except Blavatsky went haywire and started adding some of her own fanciful bullshit and spiritual delusions of grandeur to it. Nicholas and Helena Roerich, the founders of Agni Yoga who went on similar pilgrimages throughout Asia and claimed contact with similar “Mahatmas,” likewise. Gurdjieff, also in touch with this source. Finally, even certain Sufis, like the Naqshbandi Sufi Idries Shah and his affiliates, in contact with them.

Is this ridiculous? Is this plausible? Sorry for spilling my spaghetti. It’s a topic I’m really interested in. It would also be acting the same as the legend of “Shambhala” in Tibetan Buddhism. Another point of note: there’s the Surmang Monastery in Tibet some have tied to Gurdjieff’s name of this group (the Sarmounis), also where Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche (controversial figure but amazing writings) and the Trungpa Tulkus come from, and where the Karma Kagyu sect has a foothold.

A modified and more tenable thesis might go, figures like the Roeriches and Blavatsky need not have literally come in contact with such figures (“the Sarmounis”, whether existent or not) to have been in alignment with them, and to have used largely the same sources as them with the same goal (distilling the highest wisdom of various cultural and religious traditions, particularly Asian ones, into a universally applicable teaching), hence capable of being intertextually resonant with and open to comparison with this compelling symbol or myth (whether real or not, again) — of the Sarmounis.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Tarock I: the Pagat or Spatz

Tarock I, the smallest trump, is traditionally called the Pagat. The name is derived from the Italian bagatto, which has no other meaning, but is related to bagatelle which refers to "something... that is small and not important". The name probably alludes, therefore, to its status as the lowest trump card. It is also referred to as the Spatz ("sparrow"), a typical German term for a low-value card.

There is often a bonus for taking the last trick of a deal with the Pagat and known as Pagat Ultimo.

In French Tarock the card is called le petit ("the little one").

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
i found these tips in a random old reddit thread and it’s fantastic advice

1. Imagine your desires for the sake of experiencing them in the now, not for the purpose of creating them.
2. Techniques such as affirmations, scripting, etc. are pointless if they do not bring upon the feeling of the wish fulfilled. Saying "I am wealthy" 10,000 times a day will not manifest wealth if it does not shift your mental state into one who feels wealthy.
3. Look at past imaginal acts as memories, not just day
dreams.
4. Understand what you assume to be true will inevitably be reflected as fact in the 3D.
5. Understand that feeling the emotions of your desire fulfilled is not your goal when visualizing or using any other techniques. The only goal is to feel that it is already real and has happened, emotion is only a byproduct. (It's still a good sign though when you feel good, it just isn't what brings your desire into the 3D)
6. Understand everything in your external reality is a result of your internal reality, literally everything.

INTRODUCTION
by
Israel Regardie

THE MALADAPTIVE FALLACY The What and The Who of it!
The maladaptive fallacy is based on the assumption that man's nature is inherently flawed. What does this mean? Miss Man aged Man has decided through aeons of self-reflection that what the observer observes (man) is in fact — "No-Dam-Good." This is the indictment — the moral accusation. The followers of this verdict believe that the proof of this is man's own behavior, i.e., wars, dis-obedience to God, class struggle, and an array of similar stupidities. On the other hand, the small voice of his defense whispers that man has also co-operated with the evolutionary imperative for his enlightened self-interest. Some examples are charity, medicine, science, heroism, etc. Which ever tunnel reality they choose to focus on, both are inappropriate since it has been assumed that man is a completed product. What both sides do not see is that mankind is nothing but the result of the trial and error (also known as trial and success) factor of a great bio-spiritual experiment. The problem lies in the fact that "trial and error" is the culture that is regarded as more sacrosant than the biology which forms its base.

posts.com: I have personally read "My Big Toe" It's really dense, 3 books in one. It is filled with complex words that I found myself googling every other paragraph. But it is an absolute wonderful read, it is the type of book you need to re read a couple of times to really absorb the subject and understand. This guy is one of the best thinkers I have come across, very sound and reasonable when talking about something so subjective and abstract as the nature of reality. Wonderful book for the more rational and scientifically minded yet with all the magic and wonder of any mystic writings.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>34018070
>>34018626
>In what world?
Could be some infrasound bullshit that's louder than footsteps but with a frequency below our ear's ability to hear. It would explain the feeling of pressure and unease. If the alleyway was located between two old industrial buildings, there is a chance that some machinery is still running or, if totally abandoned, some element of its infrastructure is still connected to the larger grid. Electrical equipment can hum very loudly, and steam pipes can vibrate/knock against their surroundings. The sounds from such things could be muffled by brick/masonry/earth, all but silencing their audible components, while the lower, inaudible frequencies escape. It is also possible that the nature of the alley itself serves to amplify this infrasound, bouncing it back and forth between the walls, while blocking external noises like wind from entering.

>I get assigned one of the opossums who hasn't been injured as bad, only has one of the holes near its stomach. docs already got it patched up, my job is to just watch over it and help it get back on its feet. it needs special attention due to the blood loss

>skip ahead 2-3 days. we're still getting more and more opossums with these injuries. the owner of the rehab center decides to contact the local game wardens about this, we're suspecting animal cruelty at this point and they take notes and decide to start going on the look out for whatever's causing this

>the opossum i got assigned (i called him Grapes because that seemed to be his favorite food) has healed quite well and most of the opossums are in a good state to be released back into the wild.

>>34028731
>physical activity
= Mars

From a transit point of view, transit Mars has been in Gemini with your natal Moon and trine natal Mars.
Sun is trine Mars - pride/ego/identity (Sun) in harmony with physical activity (Mars).
Mars itself is in detriment and in opposition to Saturn in fall. This could indicate struggles with a lack of motivation (Mars) and self-discipline (Saturn) and vice-versa, overdoing it, e.g. not limiting your physical activity, or the other things associated with Mars such as anger. You need to learn how to negotiate between the energy of Mars and Saturn. This is a recurring theme in your life.
The planets are in mutual reception which may lessen the negative effects of this opposition. They are both lined up to the MC-IC axis too, so this opposition is linked with your career/reputation (MC) and private life (IC).
Read up on Mars opposition Saturn to learn more.

It depends upon what you believe orbs even are. Orbs originally were the shine/glow of a star, how far it reaches out.

It's the question of, "How close must these objects be in order to elicit a real effect?" And the safest answer is 3 degrees or less, although 5 degrees is often assumed and aspecting fixed stars is vastly more conservative in estimate.

In my opinion one ought to give grades to the orbs, so that the intensities are treated appropriately different in degree rather than kind. Example, 0 to 1 degrees is the strongest and 4 to 5 degrees much weaker, perhaps.

posts.com:
>>34041189
>I thought Venus was about love and relationships?
No that's a misconception that's taken root and been perpetuated uncritically ever since.
Venus is about "love" in the sense of enjoyment. It's about what natives take pleasure in, what is pleasurable, and what is unpleasant.
It is only by *extension* that it has anything to do with romance. Due to being the domicile of Libra, it is slanted toward enjoying sociality, and again by extension interpersonal relationships. But to reduce it to "love and relationships" is to miss that it is about all things regarding the pleasure principle.

Venus in Aries imparts a love of conflict and disharmony and we may even say drama as well as a capriciousness that would make Libra's look somewhat constant (as well as a lack of refinement and pretension that would characterize Libra, but that hasn't anything to do with the post in question). Venus in Aries natives are a bit barbaric / savage in their tastes.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>34029180
>Vipassana without shamatha is jumping on a wild horse in an attempt to tame it. You'll likely be kicked off.

This spoke directly into my heart.
I was trying to do vipassana/awareness all this time believing that concentrating on my breath while ignoring everything else was bad and that I was "running away from important things" (those important things were mindless daydreaming and non-important thoughts) but I now know that concentration sharpens your brain activity and helps you do EVERYTHING including insight better.

So yeah, just sit and focus on your breath, your mind will come and tell you "maybe this is not the right way" or you may catch yourself thinking about your breath instead of just feeling it/observing it, just return to the object. See how I said "feeling", this is important for me because "Watching the breath" may become a thought and then you find yourself sitting and thinking about watching the breath instead of actually watching the breath, so maybe better sit and FEEL the breath - for me it was my belly which was expanding a lot and my perineum/pelvic floor along with it and so I focused on them.

There are people who don't need concentration practice because maybe they already have it but for people like me who used to be weed, alcohol and videogame junkies it was crucial to train my concentration again.

>Useful tips before posting:
•If you're a reader post that you're offering readings and what information is required from the querent; same goes for trading.
•Look for posts to determine if there's an active reader, what's needed and before posting, check if they finished reading already.
•Some readers will refuse to do certain readings - respect that choice. Do not harass readers if your query is refused/skipped.
•Traders should respect that a traded read will be granted, as per an agreement of trade. Free readers have the option of picking their queries.
•Bullshit queries will get bullshit answers. Same for vague queries.
•Making an AQ (air query) by not addressing a reader, in particular, is possible but doesn't guarantee an answer.
•Avoid making the same query repeatedly and/or to different readers in a short period of time, as this may lead to more confusion.
•Provide feedback when applicable and be considerate to the reader. We're a growing community, many readers are starting and need to know what they are doing right or wrong. Let's help each other to improve.

One's time in Hell, as in the other five realms, is not eternal, however. posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Hey guys, finishing editing a never before seen Magnapinnidae ( nightmare squid, big fin squid ) video that was taken by a coworker of mine when we were working out in the Atlantic.
I think it will add some insight to how they hunt.... to this point scientists really did not know how they hunt, it was thought they drag their arms along the bottom of the ocean to ensnare prey. At the very least this video shows they has a elasticity to their arms. I seems that the length of the arms can change and shoot out several times the initial length.

The ROV working at 7k plus feet noticed the squid, moved in to film it and followed it. durring that time the squid decided to strike the ROV with it's arms.

Just thought I would share a new video with you before everyone else sees it, my project in Tahoe is not getting any film at the moment because the weather is prohibiting it. Although the work on my ROV is going great and exceeding what i thought i could build. The new ROV plus the collaboration and help i have now will surely help with the exploration on Tahoe and its undiscovered life at 1650ft. If all works out as planned i will be exploring anomalies off the coast of America withing a year or two with it, ( built to go to 7700 ft.)
Anyways, stand by for video link, i have a short time on land before we head back offshore. AMA

PS this is the 9th video of the bigfin ever, i have released three of those and the forth (a baby bigfin (like newborn) will be posted in the next few weeks.) so stay tuned for that.

chase

I don’t wanna harp on academics too much, because they are an important part of this, but part of me does echo the frustration Chase feels for academia. There is a problem in the academic world right now that I feel happens to all established bureaucratic organizations at some point. There is a lot of arrogance, gatekeeping from established scientists, a lot of “safe science” rather than efforts to push the envelope. Peer review committees have gone from preventing false science through rigorous review, to preventing any science they themselves want to be false. The ongoing reproducibility crisis shows that the peer reviewers arent even preventing bad science anymore even, just that which they dislike.

I believe every generation and civilization had their priest class. Our old religious priest classes have been replaced by a “scientific” priest class with the same ego and human aspect that ran organized religions into the ground. The commercialization of science and turning it into a degree mill opened up the ranks from the fringe, brilliant and dedicated, to the average person, the career student, and the politically and ego driven personalities accompanying them. Remember, the average person is much more crowdminded and weary to stand out. Most famous scientists are not, they stood out and went their own way. This is a generation of crowd-conscious science, which is inherently self-limiting to any science that challenges the status quo.
There are many, many amazing scientists still out there, but they are amazing despite the modern academic establishment, despite their nonsense and vapid conventions, rather than because of them.

Oregano oil at the minimum carvacrol levels of protocol are produced by steam distillation. No additional solvents are required, as it uses vapor condensation to separate the volatile molecules and active compounds.

https://chemdictionary.org/steam-distillation/

Finally, NAC is produced by a reaction between cysteine hydrochloride and acetic anhydride. A LC–UV–MS analysis of NAC shows impurities to be cysteine, cystine and diacteylcystine, which are non-toxic. NAC eventually breaks down to Di-NAC from oxidation, which is also non-toxic.

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S002196730000741X

I've been trying to make a belief system for myself which makes sense to me. I don't believe in Christianity or any other major religion, but I'm a bit stuck.

I believe in spirits (which I think are bundles of mental energy), and it's for that reason that I believe humans and other sentient beings can become spirits when they die. I believe it's only a few that become spirits, as most of the mental energy left from a person who's died is reused, so to speak - it's given to another sentient being just being born.

Mental energy can take on a lot of forms, too, I think. Like positive, negative, sexual, and so on.

But the thing I can't wrap my head around is whether spirits need to sustain themselves? Obviously, succubi (to me at least) are spirits which feed off of sexual energy. I believe that the act of feeding off of energy isn't to sustain themselves, but rather so they can grow stronger as spirits as they gather more sexual mental energy.

I believe it's this kind of system that Gods or dieties might use in order to grow powerful. The more mental energy they receive through worship, the stronger they might be.

That's my thought process, at least.

But I still have a few questions that I can't quite figure out the answer to.

Do spirits (succubi for example) feed off of energy in order to sustain themselves out of necessity, or do they do so to grow stronger?

Depending on the answer to question one, do spirits feed off of each other?

Is mental energy something that be created or destroyed, or does it follow the laws of physics as well? If it can be created, where does it come from?

So that's what I'm thinking. Let me know your thoughts!!

SCP-ES-170
Object Class: Safe

Special Containment Procedures: The instances of SCP-ES-170 must be stored inside a metal cabinet equipped with a card, retina and fingerprint reader. The failure of any of these measures will result in the deployment of armed teams to capture and interrogate all present in the room.

On a monthly basis, a qualified member must inspect all the samples of SCP-ES-170 in order to detect deterioration or repair damage to the fabric and embroidery, as well as perform a steam cleaning of them. At the end of this, the instances of SCP-ES-170 must be replaced inside the closet.

The use of SCP-ES-170 without special permission that must be approved by at least 3 members of Level-3 personnel is strictly prohibited. Failure to comply with this rule by unauthorized personnel will result in submission by non-lethal weapons and subsequent interrogation.

Using any damaged instance will result in immediate removal without regard to rank within the Foundation.

Description: SCP-ES-170 is the collective designation for a batch of dark-colored Fedora-type hats. The label inside indicates that they were made by "The Factory". When SCP-ES-170 is used by a human subject, it is capable of altering the user's morphology in different physical configurations (See experiment annex). The process has been described as painless, but with slight tingling sensations in the extremities.

Once any instance of SCP-ES-170 comes into contact with the head of a human being, it will begin to rapidly alter the morphology and clothing during a process that lasts approximately 0.975 seconds. Despite being painless, feelings of discomfort have been described by subjects with developed muscles. It is believed that this happens because of the drastic change caused by SCP-ES-170; however, the body seems to get used to these changes, canceling the feeling of discomfort after a few hours.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
The clothes generated by SCP-ES-170 are generally formal in appearance, being mostly tuxedo suits with different variations of color and design, however, some instances of SCP-ES-170 generate typical clothing from popular cultures, including among these a gnawed peasant outfit, made up of simple pants and button-down shirts, Kimonos, Arabic tunics, combinations of jeans with various designs of t-shirts, sports suits, lab coats, among others.

Each instance of SCP-ES-170 has the ability to drastically alter the user's facial features, being able to imitate the characteristic features of different ethnic groups from countries such as France, Spain, Egypt, England, Japan, among others. Said change is accompanied by a marked accent on the part of the subject and a slight understanding of the language associated with the ethnicity replicated through the use of SCP-ES-170.

Due to this, it is believed that the manufacture of SCP-ES-170 was carried out for espionage or infiltration purposes, although the existence of other instances of SCP-ES-170 outside the Foundation is currently unknown.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Test Nº1
Introduction: For this test, D-2317 was ordered to use several instances of SCP-ES-170 in order to check the results of multiple body changes in a row.

Result: D-2317 reported feeling dizzy and seeing flickering lights after a total of 8 consecutive changes. Further investigation revealed that this is due to changes in D-2317's blood pressure due to the constant alteration of morphology; however, these symptoms disappear after a few minutes.

Note: Once the instance of SCP-ES-170 is removed, the test subject will begin to recover the original morphology in an accelerated manner. The successive use of SCP-ES-170 seems to delay this process, however, no permanent changes have been recorded in the test subject.

Test Nº2
Introduction: For this test, D-401, who was overweight, was ordered to use an instance of SCP-ES-170 that generates the appearance of a middle-aged man with a thin build.

Result: D-401 began to convulse violently a few seconds after using the SCP-ES-170 instance. For several seconds D-401's body began to lose body fat until it became slender in appearance. D-401 described a burning sensation in his body, emphasizing his abdominal and neck area. Once the test was finished, D-401 still kept a slender figure, proving that some changes made by SCP-ES-170 can become permanent.

Note: D-401 was found dead in his cell a few hours after the experiment. Subsequent autopsies revealed high amounts of fat around his internal organs, as well as his entire cranial cavity. The cause of death was classified as a cerebral infarction due to artery obstruction and multiple organ failure.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Test Nº3
Introduction: For this test, D-4012 was ordered to use multiple instances of SCP-ES-170 at the same time in order to check if the changes are combinable.

Result: The individual effects of each instance appear to be combined when using more than one instance, combining two instances, one that gave the appearance of a Caucasian male and one that replicated the appearance of a Black male respectively, will result in a combined appearance, this being a subject with brown skin and mulatto features. However, due to the indiscretion of wearing more than one hat at a time, it is believed that this effect was unintentional, more of a glitch.

Test Nº4
Introduction: For this test, D-319 was ordered to use a damaged model of SCP-ES-170 to observe if the state of the instances affects their performance when altering the body of the subjects. The instance used during testing had a tear at the top.

Result: [DATA EXPUNGED] D-319 was successfully eliminated after joint action by the security team and the doctors present in the room.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
During the counting and storage of each instance of SCP-ES-170, it was possible to find a different model from the others, this one with two labels on the inside, reading "the factory, located below. This one had a note attached to it by a white cord. This instance was named SCP-ES-170-A, presenting several notable differences with respect to the other registered instances.

SCP-ES-170-A does not alter the morphology of the subject and, instead, it seems to have the ability to generate some kind of hologram or tangible visual distortion around the subject. The appearance of said distortion varies drastically each time SCP-ES-170-A is removed and repositioned on the subject's head.

It is known that this model has some device or internal mechanism capable of generating said distortions around the user's body because multiple studies carried out on it have revealed the presence of complex metallic components inside, however, the external appearance is indistinguishable to that of the other instances, being that of a black fedora hat. SCP-ES-170-A does not present incompatibilities with test subjects either, being capable of adapting its "hologram" to the physical specifications of the user.
Note found inside SCP-ES-170-A
Greetings Mr. Joe! First of all we would like to thank you for your exorbitant purchase, as you know we appreciate it very much for your faithfulness and perseverance when making requests that, although they are not our specialty as master blacksmiths, we gladly accept due to the challenge of compacting all the [ ILLEGIBLE] so that it would fit within the small dimensions of a hat without being unsightly.

-Att: The best workforce in the Market, The factory

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Interviewer: Agent

Interviewee: Mr. Abraham Jones; Caucasian man in his 30s

Introduction: Mr. Abraham opened a garage sale on 11/23/20 in which he claimed to have a batch of magical hats that changed the physical appearance of whoever wore them; this caught the attention of Agent, who came to the scene under the alibi of an interested civilian. The interview begins after an extensive conversation about various items at the garage sale

Agent Mr. Abraham, your vinyl record collection and gramophone are certainly very tempting, but I'm more interested in your other collection.

Mr. Abraham: Oh yeah those, follow me here (Abraham proceeds to lead the agent inside the property, to a dusty metal closet) these are here, a beauty, don't you think?

Agent Are those the "Magic" hats?

Mr. Abraham: Yes, I know what you're thinking, boy, but what I'm saying is true, you can try some on if you want.

Agent (Investigator proceeds to put on one of the hats and then looks at himself in a mirror, reflecting an African-American man in a 1920s outfit) Oh my god

Mr. Abraham: (Laughing) Forty, forty fucking years and you're the first to believe me. Still interested in buying them?

Agent : Forty? Mr Abraham that has forget it, before discussing the price, could you tell me how you got them if you don't mind?
Mr. Abraham: Honestly, it's not a very interesting story; I had this friend from work, his name was Billy Joe, we used to meet up often at a local bar. The guy was a bastard but he sure liked paying for the drinks.

Agent What about him?

Mr. Abraham: Not really, he was the son of a local billionaire, we called him Old Joe by his last name and although we didn't get along very well, one night Billy showed up at my doorstep drenched in sweat. He was very upset and it seemed that he had not slept for a long time.

Agent What did he tell you?

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Mr. Abraham: Lots of things, most of it nonsense He told me that his father was involved in some kind of hidden market or something. I remember him babbling some crazy stuff about some kind of factory and some kind of foundation, both looking for him for some reason. Back then he could only think "this is a fucking joker
Agent Well I wouldn't have believed it either. What was that market?

Mr. Abraham: Oh yes, he told me that it was a place or places where especially peculiar things were exchanged; from my point of view, the idiot was referring to some black market that god knows what they deal with. I tell you young man, these things do not lead to anything good
Agent Wait there's something wrong, if it was a black market why mention a factory? As far as I know, drugs or even people are usually traded there, talking about a factory would not make ense
Mr. Abraham And he hasn't, he just asked me to put away the hats and after that he took off like the devil was after him, never came back to work and his father was found dead in his home the next morning under mysterious circumstances. I guess he had problems with some mafia.

Agent Sorry to hear that, but I have one last question. Did he tell you anything about that supposed foundation?

Mr. Abraham: Nothing at all he just mentioned it before he left. I could swear it was the police or some detective department that found out what his father was doing, but honestly, I have no idea.

Agent I understand, Mr. Abraham. How much would he be willing to sell me those hats for?
Mr. Abraham: I see you liked there How about $25 each?
Agent How about $15?
Mr. Abraham: I can bring them down to $20
Agent How about this? $10 each and you get to keep this (The agent proceeds to hand over his gold plated watch)
Mr. Abraham: (Laughing) Young man, you sure know how to do business
Agent Could we go back to the front and talk more about that vinyl record collection while I load this into my van?
Mr. Abraham: With pleasure, come with me

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Mr. Abraham: Here you are, I almost forgot about this (Abraham proceeds to hand him his hat, which was classified as SCP-ES-170-A.)

Agent : Mr. Abraham, you ? (Agent appears in apparent shock after seeing Mr. Abraham's appearance, which resembled that of a 90-year-old man.)

Mr. Abraham: You are a good man, give this to someone who is going to need it. I won't need it.

<End of Interview>

Note: Mr. Abraham was found dead 14 hours later, lying on the couch in his house. Cause of death: One shot from a 9mm pistol, apparently fired from the kitchen about 5 meters away. No traces of the killer were found.

Following a formal request made to the Ethics Committee and the O5-Council, SCP-ES-170-A is currently under the care of Dr.

SCP-ES-031

Object Class: Safe

Special Containment Procedures: SCP-ES-031 must be covered with a plastic cover and hung from a hanger inside a locked cabinet. Only Level 2 and higher personnel can access SCP-ES-031. Every experiment with SCP-ES-031 will be properly documented.

Normal clothing preservation measures with SCP-ES-031 must be followed. This includes machine washing, ironing and protection against moths and mites. As of the date of, the latter is considered unnecessary.

Description: SCP-ES-031 is a black cloth jacket, suit model. It has two pockets on the outside and eight pockets on the inside. The make and manufacturer are unknown, as the neck label appears to have been torn off. In one of the folds on the back there is another label, only with the factory logo.

SCP-ES-031 tissue can be cut with scissors and sewn normally. However, it shows complete resistance in terms of hostile actions (knives, projectiles, fire), as well as improper buoyancy of the material.

When SCP-ES-031 is worn by a subject, an object or artifact considered suitable for a certain situation may or may not appear in one of its pockets (interior or exterior). It is unknown how these objects are generated. A recording with a thermal camera focusing on the pockets has captured that, from one frame to the next, they appear spontaneously. When it happens, the subject feels the weight of the object in the pockets, thus knowing which one to get it from.

Sometimes, SCP-ES-031 will generate anomalous mechanical artifacts that, after an indeterminate period of time, disappear again. Because of this, it has been impossible to analyze them. Artifacts, like common objects, seem to be beneficial for the wearer of SCP-ES-031 depending on the situation in which they find themselves.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Record of experiments:
The wearer of SCP-ES-031 will be put in certain situations to check the behavior of the garment.

Experiment 1:
Situation: D-349578 is wearing his orange jumpsuit and SCP-ES-031 on top, in an empty room, unaware that fire will be opened on him.
Spawned Item: A .15 caliber Beretta.
Later Event: D-349578 had been convicted of a church massacre. Seeing himself with a gun in his hands, he shot the armored glass of the observation area to escape. The agents concentrated their fire on him, killing him instantly. SCP-ES-031 was not pierced by the agents' bullets. The autopsy revealed minor bruises on his torso, consistent with those from gunshot wounds on a Kevlar vest, and normal gunshot wounds to his legs and head. The weapon did not disappear.

Experiment 2:
Situation: Agent Green wears SCP-ES-031. Dr. Smith approaches him with an unlit cigarette between her lips.
Spawned item: A lighter.
Later Event: Agent Green lights Dr. Smith's cigarette. The lighter did not disappear.

Experiment 3:
Situation: Dr. Krampft carries SCP-ES-031 under his robe. He enters the Site-63 cafeteria, where all the agents are gathered for lunch.
Spawn Item: An opaque ceramic bottle with no label. Its contents were analyzed and identified as red wine, vintage 7.
Later Event: Dr. Krampft served wine among the agents. After filling, glasses, the bottle still had wine. The object disappeared an hour later, coinciding with the end of lunch time.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Experiment 4:
Situation: D-563471 is locked up with SCP-ES-031 in a room that would be flooded with water to the ceiling.
Generated object: A mask connected by a tube to the pocket of SCP-ES-031. The length of the tube is ignored.
Later Event: D-563471 bangs on the door trying to get out when he notices the water level rising. He calms down when he sees that SCP-ES-031 is capable of floating, but his fear resumes when he sees that the water gradually reaches the ceiling, so he puts on his mask in time. An hour later, the water is receded, revealing D-563471 alive and without signs of drowning. The tube was absorbed by SCP-ES-031 and disappeared (when he reached into his pocket, it was found empty).

Experiment 5:
Situation: D-563471 is again locked up with SCP-ES-031 in a room that would be flooded, this time, with sulfuric acid.
Spawned Item: A sponge.
Later Event: D-563471 panics as he begins to feel burns on his feet. Removing the sponge, he throws it to the ground and bangs on the door in desperation. The sponge absorbs the acid without showing deterioration, at the same time that it strongly aspirates the gases produced. D-563471 stands shrunken in a clearing that remains dry. After minutes of pouring acid, the sponge was still sucking up both acid and gases, so the taps are turned off. When the chamber door was opened, the sponge disappeared and D-563471 attempted to attack the personnel.

Experiment 9:
Situation: George, Foundation mechanical engineer, takes SCP-ES-031 and stands in front of a Toyota Yaris with a damaged engine and broken windows.
Generated Object: Miscellaneous. Battery operated tools, screws and parts in different pockets. Finally, an unidentified object shaped like a syringe and a button
Later event:The engineer was removing the tools and parts from his pockets as he needed them. Little by little he was repairing the damaged engine of the vehicle.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
By pressing the button on the object, he released a resin from the tip that, when solidified, became conventional car glass. This material was used to make cool windows for the car. After the repair, both the object and the tools disappeared. Spare parts, however, remained in place. The oil stains from SCP-ES-031 have been cleaned.
Experiment 17:
Situation: Dr. King sits at his desk carrying SCP-ES-031 and places a blank sheet of paper.
Spawned Item: An apple in each pocket.
Later event: Dr. King gets angry, removes SCP-ES-031 and leaves the room. The apples did not disappear.

Experiment 18:
Situation: D-551841 is locked up with SCP-ES-031 in a cage next to SCP-.
Spawned Item: [DATA EXPUNGED]
Later Event: [DATA EXPUNGED] manages to climb onto the roof to safety. SCP- jumps to attempt to catch him, to no avail. Shortly after [DATA EXPUNGED] despite its damage, manages to devour D-551841. After a while, SCP- is engulfed in flames and is rapidly consumed. The ashes were sieved, SCP-ES-031 was recovered with ash stains, without damage to the fabric and with empty pockets.

posts.name: Anonymous

Experiment 21:

Later Event: D-464117 manages to put on his parachute in time and open it. Shortly after, D-464117 takes advantage of the parachute to try to glide out of the perimeter, also taking out of a pocket [DATA EXPUNGED] Agent finds D-464117 by the lake, takes the from him of the hands during a struggle and manages to reduce him.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Experiment 25:
Situation: Agent Birch wears SCP-ES-031. It is inserted into a monitored cold room, and the door is closed.
Spawned item: A bag with hardware tools.
Subsequent event: Agent Birch reports feeling hot air being emitted by SCP-ES-031, which keeps his entire body at a stable temperature. Examining the contents of the bag, Agent Birch finds, among other things, a drill and a blowtorch. It is assumed that these objects were generated for the purpose of breaking the door from the inside. To avoid unnecessary material damage, the door is open. The tools did not disappear.

Experiment 27:
Situation: D-641174 carries SCP-ES-031 on top of the monkey and is thrown into a 5m x 6m x 3m water tank. Inside this pond there are 47 live specimens of Myleus tiete (Panamanian piranha).
Spawn Item: Before the drop, a green dusty substance. Retrieved a sample for study.
Later event:As seen in Experiment 4, SCP-ES-031 (and by extension, D-641174) floats. The generated green dust comes into contact with the water, staining it a very weak green tone. The piranhas move away from the area until all the water in the tank is dyed that color. They begin swimming in random directions, disoriented and with no intention of attacking D-641174, who proceeds to swim to the edge of the tank, bellowing a series of expletives.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Experiment 32:
Situation: D-175344 is locked up with SCP-ES-031 in a chamber that would be gradually emptied of air, also decreasing the pressure.
Spawned Object: Same as Experiment 4.
Later Event:D-175344 breathes through the mask. His respiratory system was not damaged as the oxygen level dropped. Upon reaching a critical level, D-175344's ears began to bleed, showing symptoms of decompression damage. It was at this point that SCP-ES-031 began to expel oxygen with such intensity that the mask was ejected from D-175344's mouth and propelled in all directions, always attached to the tube connected to the pocket. The oxygen level remained at a fairly low level, but due to the intervention of SCP-ES-031 it could not be lowered any further. After a few minutes, D-175344 fell unconscious from lack of air. Pressure was returned to the chamber and D-175344 was sent to the medical floor for resuscitation.

posts.sub: Mandela Effect | The Lion and the Lamb
posts.com:
Okay, what the fuck is actually happening? The lion and the lamb are back in the Bible.

I swear, just a couple days ago I saw that Isaiah 11:6 ONLY mentioned a lamb and a wolf. Now the lion is back? And there’s also a child and a calf now. I used this Bible passage as an example of a Mandela effect just a few days ago, and there was no mention of a lion, let alone in the same VERSE. I used to be kind of skeptical about Mandela effects, but after seeing something change almost before my eyes I don’t know what to believe anymore.

The general timeline:
People remember Isaiah 11:6 mentioning a lion lying with a lamb.
Then, the lion was removed and replaced with a wolf. This freaked out a lot of people, myself included, who checked their bibles and found no mention of the lion AT ALL. Then we were told there was never a lion.
I can’t count how many times I’ve looked up Isaiah 11:6 just to verify there was never a lion.
And tonight, I looked at it again to remember the exact wording, and THE LION IS BACK. But the wolf is still there, and there is a calf and child now.

Is anyone else as surprised as me, or am I really crazy?

Also, Mandela effect general I guess. Can we try to limit general Mandela discussion to memorizing things like this that are apparently prone to change? What else should we be memorizing and look out for?

I know some of you think strongly that Mandela effect is fake or real, but it doesn’t do any good to argue, since it will never convince anyone. Let’s try to be productive?

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
1/2 here's my dream interpretation copypasta, from my personal experience.

1) Dreams are an oniric mirror of the real life and the mind of the dreamer. It is an extension of your consciousness while you are resting.
2) True interpretation requires intimate knowledge of the minute life of the dreamer and his mind. The dreamer holds the key to interpret his own dreams and figure out the correlation of the events in the dream to the corresponding situations in real life.
3) I consider dreams to be immersive "workshops" to work out issues, like a videogame's practice mode. Actions in dreams do not have consequences once you wake up. No one has ever been hospitalized because of an accident in a dream.
4) Dreams are not good or bad omens in and out of themselves. They do not predict the future. They have no hold on real life. They are not external messages from the spirit world*. You will not access "information" you are not already privy to in your real life, although some bits of it that you are aware of may take new forms and be combined and rearranged in creative ways. So-called "prophetic" dreams are either coincidences or self-fulfilled prophecies.
*I regretfully include this bit even though I hate to discount the possibility that dreams are a portal to or from an external extraordinary world. I have dreamed of my mother in a very positive way soon after her death and it was very comforting at the time as I believed it was her own soul contacting me. However I now hold the view that the dream world is entirely internally generated due to my life experience. I am not interested in denying other people's unexplained or paranormal experiences, but I cannot honestly support them either.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
2/2
5) However, revelations or certainties that have been brewing subconsciously in one's mind for a time may finally surface within a dream, and as such affect real life. In other words, you may access your intuition in a more vivid form.
6) Dreams are not always about life or death issues, but often about trivial situations. They are no less useful but their importance should not be exagerated.
7) Nightmares have a very positive connotation for the dreamer and should be embraced. They are simulations which prepares you psychologically for future difficulties and challenges. If you wake up from a nightmare and feel relieved that it is over, consider your day blessed.
8) Not all details in a dream have a profound meaning. There is a lot of randomly generated "noise" that is not worth pondering about, especially if you have no special emotional reaction to it within the dream. Dreams are not David Lynch movies, mathematical equations or puzzles to be solved, even though they certainly are cryptic, fickle and frustrating to interpret.
9) A good first step to interpret a dream is to focus on your emotional responses within them. The stronger the emotion, the more there is to take away from this part of the dream.

We gather in these generals to discuss our experiences, memories, and connection with Mother Lilith, as well as give other anons who are interested or would like to learn more about Her information or advice.
Last thread: >>33909694

>Practices or rituals associated with Lilith?
This differs from person to person, but common approaches include giving energy to one of her sigils, meditating on her energy, chanting her enn, working with sexual spirits, doing what you think she would do, making offerings of incense/chocolate/tea, or simply praying.
While some people might feel the most comfortable engaging with her in a worshipful manner, blind faith is discouraged. It's always important to think and make decisions for oneself, and as such, Lilith guides us to understand things for ourselves.

>Books
- Embracing Lilith by Mark H Williams: No PDF available online, but it's worth the price of admission.
Split into three sections, it covers accounts of working with the Goddess and her place in history, a fictional account of her origins written from her perspective, and a Grimoire.
- Lilith: Dark Feminine Archetype by Asenath Mason: https://pdfcoffee.com/lilith-dark-feminine-archetype-2-pdf-free.html
A collection of writings by various peoples, with a brief but fairly thorough history at the beginning. There's a lot of random poetry in there; not useful for an occultist, but decent for an admirer.
- Lilith: Goddess of Sitra Ahra: https://zeitenundformen.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/lilith-goddess-of-sitra-ahrab-t-p.pdf
Contains a ton of aspects with associated variety of sigils.

This set of dreams recurred maybe 3-4 times back then and people that I tell usually say they were just child dreams. I still think about them.

I have a few theories of why it happens:
1. The human brain is lazy, we subconsciously categorize everything on a daily basis, but we won't have an individual folder on our heads for each person so we tend to make forced associations. The older we get and the more faces we see things can oly get worse. With internet and social media we're constantly looking at new people and our brains can't deal with that.

posts.com:
You can express your last dreams, your attempts and ask anything about it

WBTB: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/WBTB-Tutorial
MILD: http://skyfalldreams.net/guides/skyfalls-mild-guide/
additional MILD info:
http://skyfalldreams.net/guides/skyfalls-intention-setting/
SSILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/129734-senses-initiated-lucid-dream-ssild.html
WILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/WILD-Tutorial
FILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/36683-finger-induced-lucid-dream-fild.html
DEILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/DEILD-Tutorial
CANWILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wake-initiated-lucid-dreams-wild/87710-%2A%2Acrazyinsanes-wild-tutorial-%2A%2A.html
CAT: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/CAT-Tutorial
ADA: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/113253-all-day-awareness-dild-tutorial-kingyoshi.html

Paper on natural LDs: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6290891/

Do us a favor and bump this general from time to time if you're interested

Quick reminders for beginners:
-don't forget to write your dreams down after waking up. no matter how little detail, just do it
-reality checks aren't likely to give you a LD by themselves, think of them as a stepping stool, they are not a replacement for techniques
-WBTB is mostly mandatory for most people, if you struggle with your sleep schedule then ADA is your best option
-if you're just starting out you should be doing WBTB in addition to either SSILD or MILD as those two are the easiest techniques
-while WILD and it's derivatives [FILD, DEILD and CANWILD] may sound alluring to some of you, if you cannot fall asleep within 10~20mins you're gonna have a really hard time achieving a WILD

I shared a dream with my mom once. I am not gonna green text it.
I was about five years old when this happened. My mom would stay at home to take care of me, and one day, like any other day, we both were taking a nap in her bed. I had a dream where I was in front of my house playing, when all of the sudden Godzilla was coming, and we had to run inside to hide. I ran into the house and into the basement.
The basement in my house was referred to as "1% finished". This means it was just a old basement with all the pipes and boilers visible. The basement in my dream was the same, a long dark room filled with pipes, except the only difference was the lightbulb in the dream basement was red.
So my dream ends with me hiding in my basement, a red room full of pipes with Godzilla coming for us. My mom wakes me up.
"Did you just have a dream where we were both on a submarine and Godzilla was after us"?
I like to look at the similarities here. We were both in a red room, underneath the surface, with Godzilla after us. posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>34033077
119 is probably the strongest.
>This psalm is one of about a dozen alphabetic acrostic poems in the Bible. Its 176 verses are divided into twenty-two stanzas, one stanza for each letter of the Hebrew alphabet; within each stanza, each of the eight verses begins (in Hebrew) with that letter.[13] The name of God (Yahweh/Jehovah) appears twenty-four times.
>The acrostic form and the use of the Torah words constitute the framework for an elaborate prayer. The grounds for the prayer are established in the first two stanzas (alef and beth): the Torah is held up as a source of blessing and right conduct, and the psalmist pledges to dedicate himself to the law. The prayer proper begins in the third stanza (gimel, v. 17). Like many other psalms, this prayer includes dramatic lament (e.g. verses 81–88), joyous praise (e.g. verses 45–48) and prayers for life, deliverance and vindication (e.g. verses 132–34). What makes Psalm 119 unique is the way that these requests are continually and explicitly grounded in the gift of the Torah and the psalmist's loyalty to it.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psalm_119

>>34035768
It's very simple. When you do the Psalm Magic formula with EVERY Psalm (set a desire, read the Psalm out loud once as an incantation, then read through it again to find the occult meanings), then that's one degree of initiation. Doing it again counts as another degree, and so on. You don't have to do the Psalms in order. Don't forget that Psalm 119 is broken up into multiple Psalms.

Not recommended to rush the process, since the wisdom comes from deciphering the meanings of each Psalm. If you feel like a Psalm's calling you to go over it multiple days, do so.

Source: Ariel Gatoga and Pater Amadeus mention these in their booklets.

posts.com: Plato popularized Pythagoras through his (Plato's) realm of forms ideology. Pythagoras said that all the world and reality could be explained by math, so it literally was math. The problem is that nothing in this reality that we live in is actually a perfect geometric constant: there is no such thing as a perfect 'triangle' (material things), because atoms are constantly in motion or machinery is billionths of an inch imprecise, nor is there of ideas (immaterial things like beauty, love, and all of our sensations exist along a spectrum that never reaches universal perfection). So if this is how our imperfect reality functions (where a tiangle's angle sum never literally equals 180o) then there must be a realm of perfect 'forms' that is the true reality. Plato believed in the soul, and that our duty on Earth was to perfect our 'form' so we could slot into the next level of reality. This is one reason Pythagoras is a big deal for the Masons. Plato's ideology fits in nicely with Christianity, and Pythagoras' mathematical metaphysics fits in nicely with the Mason's spiritual-architectural model. We don't know if Pythagoras was actually a real person either, and his followers were known as a decently secretive cult. I think the Masons were trying to emulate this mystique but with Christian dressing on top.

There is an explanation for that as well. I will clue >>34035931 in as well. I mentioned core, but did not fully explain all of why it is demonic. CORE math likes to teach complex operations through factoring, basically breaking down big numbers into sets of smaller numbers. You know, parentheses. Factoring is helpful in math in algebra+ since it lets you isolate variables more easily.

Now, the thing people aren't fully aware of is that calculators cannot handle factoring very well. It is a programming method where it needs to read things left to right when inputting, so it doesn't redistribute numbers you take out of factors back into them. Some expensive calculators have different modes to fix this, but it isn't common.

I will repeat for those in the back. Calculators. Cannot. Follow. Order of operations. When factoring is involved. It reads left to right, and cannot redistribute when needed due to their nature. This is a common issue, you can even look it up if you want, there is not a big mystery.

The conspiracy is that new mathematical teachings to the younger generation also forgo this knowledge to "make it easier," which in effect makes people dumber and unable to solve complicated problems correctly. That is the conspiracy.

posts.com:
This is not an instance of the Mandela effect. This is simply a lack of understanding of order of operations.

The expression is 8 / 2 * (2 + 2).
You evaluate the contents of the parentheses first to get 8 / 2 * 4.
Then you perform division and multiplication from left to right. 8 / 2 = 4; 4 * 4 = 16.

The "÷" notation for division is generally avoided in modern mathematics because it leads to unintuitive/confusing situations like this. However, the correct answer is certainly 16. No one is "stupid" for disagreeing, they were probably just tricked by the unusual notation.

You cannot. again, solve for x in these two equations:

X/2(2+2)=16

x/2(4)= 16

x(4) = 32

x = 8.

OR
x/2(4) = 1
x/2*2(4) = 1*2
x(4) = 2

x = 1/2 or .5

to get 8 from x/2(2+2) = 1, you have to assume that it is a fraction as x OVER 2(2+2) = 1.

However, we have demonstrated that this is, in fact, incorrect. Why do we know it's incorrect? Because you do the order of operations from left to right. It's 8 over 2 BEFORE the 2(4). The correct way to depict this as a fraction would be to write it as

8/2 * (2+2) where the (4) is multiplied by the 8/2 (or 4/1 if we're reducing) fraction. There's nothing ambiguous about this. The * is redundant wherein we know that 2(4) automatically gets multiplied, however, that does NOT mean that we do the order of operations out of order or backwards. 8/2 has more priority than 2(4) because it is LEFT of the 2(4), thus, the correct way to get here is 4(4) NOT 8/8.

What's confusing about this?
The original equation is
8 / 2 (2 + 2)
P is for parenthesis.
8 / 2 (4)
There are no exponents, so we move to the MD step, which is multiplication and division From left to right.
So, starting on the LEFT, 8/2 equals 4.
Now we have a 4 (four) to distribute to what's left in the parenthesis, which is (4) in this case.
4 distributed to (4) is 16.
The order of operations is "from left to right," therefore distribution must also be done from left to right. Where does it say you get to go out of order for distribution anywhere? It's left to right.
if you distribute DURING the multiplication/division step, then it must be in line with the order of operations. Since 2+2 was taken care of waaaaaay back there at the very first step, you don't even need to look at the distributive property of multiplication as there is only a single number to be distributed to.

So I've been thinking recently and this is what I've come to the conclusion of. Reality works like an engine or a clock. There are gears against gears against gears against gears. In this engine are not only your thoughts, but your considerations about hypothetical situations and also manifestations of reality itself.

You may have heard from some people that psychic abilities only happen when you're not trying, meaning the act of trying makes it stop. This is also referenced in the song "Lost it to trying" by Son Lux.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TkLT5krv_6c

So what I can infer is that your conscious existence and it's link to reality works like a clutch on a manual transmission. Once you apply intention, it moves the clutch so that you can't drive the engine with your conscious mind. Moving the clutch away from the engine disengages the engine, but the natural low-energy position is to be relaxed from the clutch and have it engaged. This is why psychic phenomenon always happens on accident.

You can also stall the engine or cause harmful impulse if you just let go of the clutch and let the engine engage "accidentally" on full throttle towards anyone or anything you're thinking of after previously being disengaged. This is where you'll get feedback like voices telling you to go away. You may also feel reflexes of the warp literally surround you and be the cause for anxiety etc.

So what you need to learn is how to disengage and engage the clutch of this manual transmission. Active intention disengages the clutch, but when you're relaxed, the engine of consciousness is naturally engaged with your surroundings and is designed to move seamlessly with reality around you. But once you apply intention, that intention's first response is to disengage.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=devo3kdSPQY&t=100s

Once you got the gist of this possibly happening, you would feel yourself easily taken advantage of by others around you (or ideas by other people) and your natural response would be to crank your engine back up to fight this driving force.

But if you naturally apply pressure to the clutch>>34037601, you can mitigate both the vulnerability of being driven by other forces around you as well as your connection to the forces around you from your own engine.

Another way of saying this is to "Tune Out" to your surroundings. I would like a simple explanation of progression and goals of meditation. I just sit in silence and try to observe what is happening in the mind and not get taken by the thoughts. Inside this "mental space" I find following 3 objects: my awarness, thoughts and images.

>Me/my awareness or my internal monologue, comments and words I use intentionally to speak to myself mentally and basically interact with thoughts.
>Thought forms that are often random and arise out of nowhere from memory or subconscious and they carry associations which if I touch them I will make a story and start thinking about it.
>Images and visualizations that are random nonsensical and arise involontery. I do not consider them thoughts as they are only images that my monkey mind pushes in my face. It's a mashup of things I saw and things I never saw.

In the process of observing my thoughts I would reach moments where I assume there was no thoughts. But the same thing even applies to thought itself. Say you think of a cat. The real meaning of that thought is NOT "cat". My view is that the real meaning is the inexpressible pure experience of "having the thought" itself. "cat" is just the symbolic representation of the thought, and is an unreal illusion.

It probably still doesn't make sense, but I don't think I can explain it any better than that.

>Can anyone project/shift/have an out of body experience?
Yes.

>Is it not just a vivid lucid dream?
No. A full successful astral projection/shift/oobe feels just as, and often even more real than the waking reality you're experiencing right now. The difference between this and even extremely vivid lucid dreams is absolutely huge.

>Does it have to be difficult and take me months/years to attain this ability?
No, it does not, the only barrier is your mind - both conscious and subconscious. If you think it's going to be difficult, it will. Many people can be successful within their first few tries.

There exists an infinite amount of realities with infinite "you's" into which you can focus your conscious awareness. Astral projection and other OOBEs are, in essence, the same thing - projecting your consciousness into the Astral Plane etc.

Not from shifting.
Yes from projecting, but also somewhat up for debate.

•Making an AQ (air query) by not addressing a reader, in particular, is possible but doesn't guarantee an answer.
•Avoid making the same query repeatedly and/or to different readers in a short period of time, as this may lead to more confusion.

its more of a general, "i don't like to read or have reads done for myself" rule. best way i can explain is that, if i ask a question, the answer's likely already in my head if i ruminate on it long enough, making it unnecessary. further than that, if i ask the question, it'll tend to make the timeline interpret that as a doubt/break in faith, and affect the outcome (hence why i tend to word my questions as "What are the requirements for x to occur?" rather than "Will x occur?"). i find it simpler, then, to rely entirely on my own confidence and intuition. which has been very fruitful so far. though, i expect this to be a process that is rather unique to me. hopefully this explanation gets what im saying across!

I would like to talk about the phenomenon of seeing UFOs in dreams. This might be a weirder and more esoteric subject but it combines two very /x/-heavy topics but in a more interesting combination of flavored way.

I have had dreams about UFOs ever since the first time I knew such a thing existed. As a kid I would have simpler dreams with saucers that reminded me of the friendlier aliens I was exposed to in cartoons and non-violent media, but as I got older and saw more violent and terrifying alien depictions, the dreams got more elaborate too.
I tend to never dream about aliens themselves though, but often times I dream of the following aspects of them:
A. UFOs, huge and colorful and weirdly shaped and surprisingly unlike anything I can describe in their geometry, in the sky often times moving at realistically fast and terrifying speeds, sometimes even seeing them enter the atmosphere or be chased/shot at by military jets that enter shortly after it appears
B. A period of time on the Earth where it is clear that there is some kind of war between people here on the ground and an outer-planetary force, though the dreams always have a sense that it isn't aliens from outerspace but rather some kind of breakaway humans who were gone for a period of time and returned, which leads to
C. More than one Moon in the sky, and a connection between those celestial bodies I see and the civilization attacking us. Sometimes it's like they came from the Dark Side of the Moon itself, or maybe a moon of Jupiter/Saturn, like a rocket went away in the 1950s and there are now generations who grew up on one of the moons that is most similar to Earth in gravity and bodily consistency. These dreams always have a connection of these weird moons in the sky being related to the war/infiltration from the very odd UFOs I see in dreams

weirder thing is, I have had these dreams reoccurring for years but usually only one or two a year. It's like a shock when I resume that storyline in the dream
